description: Beautiful townhome available in Ashburn Square Townhouses features 3 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms with an attached garage. The inside of this well laid out Townhome feels spacious. This beautiful, modern and spacious 4 bedroom 3 full bathroom home in Tampa Palms is ready for you. The home offers great curb appeal, beautiful landscaping, plenty of parking and a fully-fenced backyard. Stepping inside, you are greeted with modern colors, high ceilings and a spacious foyer. The kitchen shares the same space and is equipped with black/stainless steel appliances, granite counters, reverse osmosis drinking/cooking water dispenser, designer faucet, glass mosaic backsplash, satin nickel drawer hardware and plenty of work space. The two secondary bedrooms share a hall bath. Downstairs hosts the 4th bedroom and 3rd full bath. The rear lanai is covered and screened allowing you to enjoy the great Florida weather. The rear yard is fenced and offers plenty of space for fun and games. The two-car garage has a door opener, elevated steel shelving and a highly efficient water heater. The house is provided with filtered and conditioned water. Lawn maintenance is included. This is a deed restricted neighborhood. Please note that high credit scores and proof of income is a must. Minimum $9, 000 monthly income required. All commercial vehicles must be parked inside the garage at all times. A Renter's Insurance Policy will be required at lease signing including liability coverage. A nationwide background and credit check will be performed on all adults.

The upstairs level also features the immense views in two directions, and holds an open concept and updated kitchen, dining area, and living space, with direct access to a large private deck that looks directly at Sutro Tower. This residence includes in-unit laundry and stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher. 1 car parking is in the garage, with additional cars that may park in the long driveway. Conveniently located next to Corona Heights Park and close to Randall Museum and Buena Vista Park, with a nearby Muni stop for a quick ride or an easy stroll to restaurants, shops and cafes in exciting Castro District or Haight Ashbury. $8, 000 per month. Tenant pays for electricity, gas and internet. EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY. This rental unit is offered in compliance with federal, state and local anti- discrimination laws.

Welcome to 64-68 Woodward Street a freshly updated 3-bedroom + living room, 1-bath apartment located on the first floor of a classic, rent-controlled 3-unit building with secure gated entry. This spacious flat offers a versatile layout, blending San Francisco charm with smart modern updates in one of the city's most vibrant neighborhoods. Highlights include: Flexible 3BR + living room layout perfect for roommates, work-from-home setups, or creative use of space Remodeled bathroom with stylish new tile and a step-in shower Updated eat-in kitchen with brand new cabinetry and ample storage Bonus mudroom with full-size private washer & dryer and extra storage great for bikes, gear, or workspace High ceilings, original hardwood floors, and fresh paint throughout Shared backyard space for relaxing or entertaining Secure gated entry for added peace of mind Tucked on a quiet block between the Mission and Duboce Triangle, you're just minutes from Dolores Park, Valencia Street, BART, MUNI, Whole Foods, and some of the best dining and nightlife in the city. Modern updates, historic charm, and rent-controlled stability all in an unbeatable location.

Available now! 909 Guerrero Street, a beautifully maintained full-floor Edwardian flat in the heart of the Mission's sought-after Liberty Hill neighborhood. This spacious 3-bedroom, 1-bath home offers a rare blend of classic architectural details with functional, modern updates. Discover soaring ceilings, original wood flooring, a brick fireplace, and other period built-ins that giving historic character. The remodeled kitchen is a bright and inviting space featuring stone countertops and ample cabinetry for storage. The unit includes two large, light-filled bedrooms, a split bathroom, and a versatile bonus room for use as a third bedroom, home office, lounge or creative studio. Additional amenities include an in-unit washer and dryer stack and a shared backyard. Set along the lively Valencia Corridor and just minutes from Noe Valley, this location offers excellent transit options (Transit Score 89). Enjoy access to renowned restaurants, cultural hotspots, boutique shopping, and iconic green spaces like Mission Dolores Park.

address: A - 1020 Pierce St, San Francisco, CA
description: Completely remodeled, spacious two-bedroom apartment in a historic Victorian built-in 1885 with 2 exclusive outside decks. Perfect to work from home inside & outside. Ideally located just two blocks from Alamo Square Park and 3 blocks from the bustling Divisadero Street restaurants and bars! Saturday and Sunday Farmers Markets, close to major tech shuttle stops and multiple major bus lines, make this a great neighborhood. The apartment has one huge front bedroom and another bedroom towards the backyard, which includes a beautiful deck overlooking a lush garden. The living room is spacious, with a fireplace and Victorian touches throughout. The fully equipped kitchen is big, fits a large kitchen table, and is equipped with a dishwasher, stone counters, and a full-size refrigerator. 3 more kitchen wall cabinets will be hung for additional storage. In-unit, high-quality laundry, and dryer, soaring ceilings, newer hardwood floors, closets, newer central heating, and remodeled bath. Tenant pays PG&E and water, no pets, owner requires good credit. This rental unit is subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause. It states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.

address: A - 1774 27 Th Ave, San Francisco, CA
description: Behind the modern facade, beautiful white oak hardwood floors, recessed lighting, plenty of natural light flows throughout the home's central patio & skylights. This home offers spacious living room with high ceilings & fireplace, formal dining room, central patio, dramatic chef's dream kitchen with premium finishes including quartz countertops, professional-grade appliances, modern cabinetry, breakfast area, 2BD/2BA w/1 master suite, & a deck with easy access to backyard. Easy maintained backyard perfect for BBQ & relaxation. Washer/dryer installed, parking on driveway, extra storage room in the garage. Close to park, gym, shops, restaurants, transits & TOP-RANKED schools. Sorry No pets.

address: Apt-101 - 1 S Park St, San Francisco, CA
description: Step into luxury with this inviting large corner unit boasting a spacious open floor plan, Bamboo hardwood floors, and modern finishes throughout. Enjoy the convenience of in-unit W/D, 10' ceilings, and a sleek kitchen featuring granite counters, a breakfast bar and high-end Bosch appliances.Bathroom exudes tranquility with a double sink vanity and a luxurious tub with a shower over. One-car parking is included in the rent. Nestled in a boutique building, this home offers the perfect retreat in the heart of South Beach. With easy access to Muni, CalTrain, and freeways, as well as proximity to the city's vibrant Tech Hub and popular destinations in SOMA, FiDi, and the Embarcadero, this is urban living at its finest. Available August 8

address: Apt-201 - 1490 Ocean Ave, San Francisco, CA
description: Experience elevated luxury in this quiet, rear-facing, fully furnished 3BD/2BA designer residence with a private terrace offering sweeping views of Westwood and Monterey Heights. Set in an exclusive 15-residence boutique building, this modern home features an open layout filled with natural light, LED lighting, dual-pane windows, Nest thermostat, and keyless entry. The gourmet kitchen includes Italian cabinetry, soft-close drawers, Dekton countertops, a large island, Bertazzoni range, Bosch appliances, built-in wine fridge, and pantry. Living and dining areas open to a private deck with outdoor furniture, Weber grill, and sunset views. The serene primary suite offers two custom closets, deck access, and ensuite with double-sink vanity. Two additional bedrooms offer ample storage. Spa-like hallway bath includes a tub/shower combo and elegant finishes. Includes in-unit washer/dryer, A/C, 1-car parking, bike storage, WiFi, water, and garbage. Amenities: rooftop deck with outdoor kitchen, firepit, fitness center with dry sauna, elevator, and modern lobby. Ideally located near Whole Foods, Ocean Ave & West Portal dining, Stonestown, Stern Grove, Muni, BART, 280, and 19th Ave. Move-in ready.

address: Apt-201 - 725 Pine St, San Francisco, CA
description: Posh Nob Hill 1 Bedroom 1 Bath furnished condo within the 1920's built former Lambourne boutique hotel with elevator. In-unit washer/dryer combo, private small deck off bedroom, stylish checkerboard flooring in large bathroom with shower, wood flooring throughout. Floor to ceiling wall closet. 100 Walkable Score to Nob Hill's world famous hotels, Chinatown, Union Square, North Beach restaurants, landmarks and public transportation; cable cars, MUNI and BART. San Francisco's chic condo living with all the charm!

address: Apt-201 - 821 Folsom St, San Francisco, CA
description: This modern 1BD/1BA unit offers an open layout and Mirage hardwood flooring. The custom-designed kitchen features white Studio Becker cabinetry, Bosch stainless appliances, Neolith countertops, and a breakfast bar perfect for entertaining. Ample closet space with custom closet upgrades, in-unit laundry with an LG stacked washer/dryer, bathroom vanity, LED mirror and fresh paint complete this modern home. Available for an August 12 move-in. Shipley Square is a 78-unit boutique building situated in the sought-after Yerba Buena neighborhood, with a serene landscaped Parisian-inspired courtyard and a top-floor terrace with 360 city views. Conveniently located near many of San Francisco's top destinations, FiDi, Downtown, Yerba Buena Gardens, SFMOMA, restaurants, and shopping. Shipley Square offers excellent proximity to all methods of transportation: Muni, BART, Caltrain, 101/280, and Bay Bridge. A new central subway station and Caltrain are within a few minutes walk. Whole Foods is around the corner. Available as early as August 12.

address: Apt-315 - 300 3 Rd St, San Francisco, CA
description: XLarge, 1-BR in Yerba Buena. This property is huge by today's standards with beautiful wood floors, floor to ceiling windows, great closet space and in-unit washer/dryer. The private outdoor patio (30' x 10') is the full length of the condo. Enjoy the lovely landscaped courtyard and listen to the birds. Located in the heart of the South of Market neighborhood at the corner of 3rd Street and Folsom. Conveniently located with easy access to restaurants, shopping, museums, the financial district, Union Square, Oracle Park, Chase Center, freeways and shuttles.The building has 24hr. Security, package management, elevator access to underground parking (add'l fee). Dry cleaners, Zip Car on site, and Crunch fitness center with heated pool (membership required).

address: Apt-410W - 101 Lombard St, San Francisco, CA
description: Welcome to 101 Lombard, where sophisticated living meets unparalleled convenience in San Francisco's vibrant North Waterfront neighborhood. This extra spacious one bedroom home features an open concept living and dining area that opens to a large, private deck with views to the building's gardens, Coit Tower & Julius' Castle. An updated kitchen boasts granite countertops and stainless steel appliances. The bedroom suite features a large walk-in closet and bathroom with dual sinks. The unit is carpeted throughout. In-unit washer/dryer and one car parking complete the home. 101 Lombard's amenities include 24-hour security, heated pool, spa, and club room with a full kitchen. Positioned in a sunbelt with a walking score of 95, you're just steps from the Embarcadero, Ferry Building, and local favorites, making 101 Lombard an excellent choice for those who seek the best of city living. **Tenants are required to carry rental insurance for the duration of the lease.** **Available 7/15**

address: Apt-601 - 646 Corbett Ave, San Francisco, CA
description: This lovely studio unit offers a bright, open floor plan and sweeping, unobstructed city views through large windows and your private balcony for a breath of fresh air. The kitchen has stainless steel appliances, sleek vinyl floors and abundant natural light. The building features a shared laundry in the basement and parking in the garage. Located in San Francisco's peaceful Upper Market neighborhood, there's easy access to public transportation and is just minutes from Twin Peaks, as well as the dining and shopping hotspots of Noe Valley, Cole Valley, and the Castro. With ample parking available and a tranquil hillside setting, 646 Corbett Ave offers the perfect balance of serene living and convenience.

address: Apt-717 - 403 Main St, San Francisco, CA
description: Highly upgraded 1 Bedroom, 1 Bathroom with Den located at The Portside, one of the OG & staple buildings in the South Beach neighborhood. This highly updated unit features city skyline views from all windows and Bay Bridge views from the wind-protected balcony, expensive Custom oak hardwood floors throughout, Philips Hue smart app-enabled lighting, automated hand sensor faucet, water-filter, new LG dishwasher and in-unit washer & dryer, and stainless steel kitchen appliances. A designer natural stone (quartzite) breakfast bar, divides the kitchen area from the spacious living room, and a hidden alcove ideal for a home office. The bedroom boasts with a gorgeous Gucci wallpaper and an ample closet. The bathroom features Designer Carrera Marble, Top of the line Toto Washlet toilet, fittings by Restoration Hardware, light fixtures by Kelly Wearstler and HD Buttercup mirror, completed by a handcrafted oak wood and stone (quartzite) vanity. The Portside offers amazing amenities, including two gyms, secured parking, an on-site building manager, a pool and spa overlooking the Embarcadero. Walking distance to the financial district, Downtown, Ferry Building, the best restaurants in the area, and so much more. Easy access to Bart, Caltrain, and Interstates 101 and 280.

address: Apt-7E - 401 Harrison St, San Francisco, CA
description: Welcome to this bright and spacious residence at The Harrison, where resort-style living meets sophisticated design. This unique floor plan features soaring 9'6 ceilings and expansive floor-to-ceiling windows, bathing the home in natural light and showcasing stunning city & some bay views. The open-concept layout includes a generous living area and a gourmet kitchen with a breakfast bar, stainless steel appliances, Waterworks brass fixtures, and elegant Carrara marble countertops. Diagonally laid hardwood floors add a touch of refinement throughout. Located in the prestigious Harrison tower in Rincon Hill and masterfully designed by renowned interior designer Ken Fulk, this home offers access to world-class, 5-star amenities: 24/7 fully staffed lobby, The Pantry with daily coffee and pastries, A fully equipped fitness center, Heated outdoor pool and spa, The crown jewel: Uncle Harry's, the exclusive top-floor resident lounge featuring 100 linear feet of unobstructed Bay Bridge views. All of this, just moments away from San Francisco's top dining, entertainment, and waterfront destinations.

address: Ph1cd - 765 Market St, San Francisco, CA
description: Fantastic opportunity to live in this fully furnished Four Seasons luxury Penthouse with a grand living room with an unparalleled wrap-around view which is a fitting residence for those who embrace San Francisco and all it has to offer. Huge 3 ensuite bedrooms plus a home office/den completes this comfortable home overlooking amazing San Francisco and beyond. Nestled in the downtown Yerba Buena neighborhood in the World Class Four Seasons Hotel. The lifestyle is inviting and bespoke catering to your fussiest needs. Large interior space, great for entertaining and relaxing and the most expansive panoramic downtown and Bay view among SF condos. Private residences offer 24/7 concierge, door and valet service.The neighborhood terrain is relatively flat and surrounded by adventure. This easy location offers direct to Highway 101/280/80, public transportation and BART are outside the front entrance. Door and valet service. 2 car included 3rd space available.

address: Unit-2C - 318 Main St, San Francisco, CA
description: .Lumina - This large 1BD/2BA plus Den and spacious terrace offers an unrivaled level of sophistication that elevate urban living beyond all expectation. High end finishes include Caesarstone quartz countertops. European porcelain flooring and shower tiles, Kohler bathroom fixtures, Gaggenau refrigerator and oven/rotisserie, five burner gas cooktop, Bosch dishwasher, In-unit washer/dryer, Custom cabinetry and Window coverings. Wood flooring in main living area with carpet in bedroom.
